FuncDef: This command enables per queue-instance-accounting. A stream of accounting messages (START/INTERIM-UPDATE/STOP) is generated per queuing instance. A queuing instance is equivalent to an sla-profile instance on non HSMDA based hardware and to subscriber on HSMDA based hardware. Accounting session id is generated per queuing instance and this accounting session id cannot be included in RADIUS Access-Request message. Queue instance counters represent volume based aggregation for all hosts sharing the queuing instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies whether accounting messages are sent for the queue-instance. The queue-instance is the subscriber on High Scale MDA (HSMDA), or the SLA profile instance.
